data.eml:eml: One century after: a reappraisal of the gnathos (sensu Pierce, 1914) in Larentiinae (Lepidoptera: Geometridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Schmidt, Olga (2015): One century after: a reappraisal of the gnathos (sensu Pierce, 1914) in Larentiinae (Lepidoptera: Geometridae). Zootaxa 3974 (3): 328-340, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3974.3.2
